attributes.action: Open the books of all major banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand to know the details of every high risk transactions the semi nationalised  banks entered into.

The Government should  quantify the total losses incurred by failing banks so that the taxpayer is fully aware of the liabilities.

As a part of the due diligence exercise, any transaction or contract that is unenforceable or appears to have been entered into without adequate risk assessment should be identified and made public.

The Government should not honour any transaction that is not enforceable through the courts.
